PitchArrayColumn¶

class baca.PitchArrayColumn.PitchArrayColumn(cells=None)¶

Pitch array column.

A pitch array column:

>>> array = baca.PitchArray(
...     [
...         [1, (2, 1), (-1.5, 2)],
...         [(7, 2), (6, 1), 1],
...         ]
...     )

>>> print(array)
[  ] [d'] [bqf    ]
[g'     ] [fs'] [ ]

>>> abjad.f(array.columns[0], strict=89)
baca.PitchArrayColumn(
    cells=(
        baca.PitchArrayCell(
            width=1,
            ),
        baca.PitchArrayCell(
            pitches=[
                abjad.NamedPitch("g'"),
                ],
            width=2,
            ),
        ),
    )

>>> print(array.columns[0])
[  ]
[g'     ]

Special methods

(AbjadValueObject).__copy__(*arguments)¶

Copies Abjad value object.

Returns new Abjad value object.

__eq__(argument)¶

Is true when argument is a pitch array column with pitch array cells equal to those of this pitch array column. Otherwise false.

Returns true or false.

(AbjadObject).__format__(format_specification='')¶

Formats Abjad object.

Set format_specification to ‘’ or ‘storage’. Interprets ‘’ equal to ‘storage’.

Returns string.

__getitem__(argument)¶

Gets cell or cell slice identified by argument.

Returns pitch array cell or slice or pitch array cells.

__hash__()¶

Hashes pitch array column.

Required to be explicitly redefined on Python 3 if __eq__ changes.

Returns integer.

__ne__(argument)¶

Is true when pitch array column does not equal argument. Otherwise false.

Returns true or false.

(AbjadObject).__repr__()¶

Gets interpreter representation of Abjad object.

Returns string.

__str__()¶

Gets string representation of pitch array column.

Returns string.

Methods

append(cell)¶

Appends cell to pitch array column.

Returns none.

extend(cells)¶

Extends cells against pitch array column.

Returns none.

remove_pitches()¶

Removes pitches from pitch array cells in pitch array column.

Returns none.

Read-only properties

cell_tokens¶

Gets cells items of pitch array column.

Returns tuple.

cell_widths¶

Gets cell widths of pitch array column.

Returns tuple.

cells¶

Gets cells of pitch array column.

Returns tuple.

column_index¶

Gets column index of pitch array column.

Returns nonnegative integer.

depth¶

Gets depth of pitch array column.

Defined equal to number of pitch array cells in pitch array column.

Returns nonnegative integer.

dimensions¶

Gets dimensions of pitch array column.

Returns pair.

has_voice_crossing¶

Is true when pitch array column has voice crossing. Otherwise false.

>>> array = baca.PitchArray([
...     [1, (2, 1), (-1.5, 2)],
...     [(7, 2), (6, 1), 1],
...     ])

>>> print(array)
[  ] [d'] [bqf    ]
[g'     ] [fs'] [ ]

>>> for column in array.columns:
...     column.has_voice_crossing
...
False
True
True
False

Returns true or false.

is_defective¶

Is true when pitch array column depth does not equal depth of parent array. Otherwise false.

Returns true or false.

parent_array¶

Gets parent array that houses pitch array column.

Returns pitch array.

pitches¶

Gets pitches in pitch array column.

Returns tuple.

start_cells¶

Gets start cells in pitch array column.

>>> array = baca.PitchArray([
...     [1, (2, 1), ([-2, -1.5], 2)],
...     [(7, 2), (6, 1), 1],
...     ])

>>> print(array)
[  ] [d'] [bf bqf    ]
[g'     ] [fs'   ] [ ]

>>> for column in array.columns:
...     column.start_cells
...
[PitchArrayCell(width=1), PitchArrayCell(pitches=[NamedPitch("g'")], width=2)]
[PitchArrayCell(pitches=[NamedPitch("d'")], width=1)]
[PitchArrayCell(pitches=[NamedPitch('bf'), NamedPitch('bqf')], width=2), PitchArrayCell(pitches=[NamedPitch("fs'")], width=1)]
[PitchArrayCell(width=1)]

Returns list.

start_pitches¶

Gets start pitches in pitch array column.

>>> array = baca.PitchArray([
...     [1, (2, 1), ([-2, -1.5], 2)],
...     [(7, 2), (6, 1), 1],
...     ])

>>> for column in array.columns:
...     column.start_pitches
...
[NamedPitch("g'")]
[NamedPitch("d'")]
[NamedPitch('bf'), NamedPitch('bqf'), NamedPitch("fs'")]
[]

Returns list.

stop_cells¶

Gets stop cells in pitch array column.

Returns tuple.

stop_pitches¶

Gets stop pitches in pitch array column.

Returns tuple.

weight¶

Gets weight of pitch array column.

Defined equal to the sum of the weight of pitch array cells in pitch array column.

Returns nonnegative integer.

width¶

Gets width of pitch array column.

Defined equal to 1 when pitch array column contains cells.

Defined equal to 0 when pitch array column contains no cells.

Returns 1 or 0.
